name: My Native Foreign Land
description:
This is an adventure game, the protagonist is the prince Mabraj whose parents (King and Queen) were killed by a traitor Jahgoor from ex-friendly clan. It happend in front of Mabraj when he was a 12 year old child, and he barely made it to run for himself. Enemies decided that he is dead, and prince had left his own Land.

But after 10 years Mabraj is ready to return for his land and his throne. He is unknown for everyone for now, and has no social weight. Ex-prince have to join factions and grow there to high ranks, for getting social weight in his Land. When Mabraj will get enough social weight, it will be possible to uncover himself to his Enemy and to try take his throne back.

Factions: Workers Union, Warriors Guild, Spy Guild, Trade Guild. Gameplay is vary for different missions and different guilds. Also it features parody on morality choices system. Gameplay varies from mission to mission.
